icon.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; make sure you have the icon library installed

icon-color.desc: Color name for icon from the Quasar Color Palette

icon-text-color.desc: Color name for icon text from the Quasar Color Palette

icon-size.desc: Size in CSS units, including unit name

icon-font-size.desc: Size in CSS units, including unit name

icon-square.desc: Removes border-radius so borders are squared

icon-rounded.desc: Applies a small standard border-radius for a squared shape of the component

icon-image.desc: Path to image to use. If used, do not also use `icon`, `icon-color`, `icon-text-color` or `icon-font-size`

icon-distance.desc: Size in CSS units, including unit name. Used to help center icons on the bar

default.desc: Anything can go into this slot
